metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25830 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in MantisBT before 2.24.3. Improper escaping of a custom field's name allows an attacker to inject HTML and, if CSP settings permit, achieve execution of arbitrary JavaScript when attempting to update said custom field via bug_actiongroup_page.php.

criterions.comment: mantis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
